name: LE PLOC
description: A young girl spends an evening alone with her dog. But a strange sound disrupts her night...

name: L'OMBRE D'UN DOUTE
description: Rey Ketsuna, a young bounty hunter specializing in the art of assassination, visits Mr. George Angster, a trafficker who captures and sells creatures of all kinds. Of these, only one really matches the mercenary's expectations.Tension builds between our two characters - do they really know each other?
